name: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A novel about an abandoned girl who raised herself in the marshes of North Carolina.

name: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

name: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A novel about a library between life and death where each book represents a different life path.

name: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

name: The Four Winds
author: Kristin Hannah
description: A story of one woman's survival during the Great Depression.

name: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
author: V.E. Schwab
description: A young woman makes a Faustian bargain to live forever but is cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets.

name: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: An astronaut wakes up alone on a spaceship with no memory of who he is or how he got there.

name: Malibu Rising
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: Four famous siblings throw an epic party to celebrate the end of the summer.

name: The Last Thing He Told Me
author: Laura Dave
description: A woman's husband disappears, leaving her with a note saying 'Protect her' referring to his daughter.

name: The Push
author: Ashley Audrain
description: A woman questions if there's something wrong with her daughter or if she's imagining things.

name: The Sanatorium
author: Sarah Pearse
description: A detective on vacation gets trapped in a remote hotel during a storm as guests start disappearing.

name: Klara and the Sun
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: An artificial friend observes human behavior while waiting to be chosen by a customer.

name: The Code Breaker
author: Walter Isaacson
description: The story of Jennifer Doudna and the gene-editing technology CRISPR.

name: The Hill We Climb
author: Amanda Gorman
description: The inaugural poem read at President Joe Biden's inauguration.

name: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: Twin sisters grow up to live very different lives, one passing as white.

name: Caste: The Origins of Our Discontents
author: Isabel Wilkerson
description: An examination of America's unspoken caste system.

name: Anxious People
author: Fredrik Backman
description: A bank robber fails and takes a group of strangers hostage during an apartment viewing.

name: The Guest List
author: Lucy Foley
description: A wedding celebration on a remote island turns deadly.

name: Transcendent Kingdom
author: Yaa Gyasi
description: A neuroscientist examines faith, science, and the opioid crisis.

name: The Thursday Murder Club
author: Richard Osman
description: Four retirees meet weekly to solve cold cases until a real murder occurs.

name: Mexican Gothic
author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
description: A socialite investigates her cousin's claims that her husband is trying to murder her.

name: The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy
description: An illustrated fable about friendship and life's important lessons.

name: Untamed
author: Glennon Doyle
description: A memoir about self-discovery and breaking free from societal expectations.

name: The House in the Cerulean Sea
author: TJ Klune
description: A caseworker visits an orphanage for magical children and discovers family.

name: Piranesi
author: Susanna Clarke
description: A man lives in a mysterious house with endless rooms and ocean tides.

name: The Lincoln Highway
author: Amor Towles
description: Three boys embark on a cross-country road trip in 1950s America.

name: Beautiful World, Where Are You
author: Sally Rooney
description: Four young people navigate love, friendship, and the meaning of life.

name: Cloud Cuckoo Land
author: Anthony Doerr
description: Interconnected stories spanning centuries about the power of storytelling.

name: The Sentence
author: Louise Erdrich
description: A bookstore employee is haunted by a ghost during the pandemic and racial justice protests.

name: Matrix
author: Lauren Groff
description: A fictional account of the life of Marie de France, a 12th century poet and nun.

name: The Love Songs of W.E.B. Du Bois
author: Honorée Fanonne Jeffers
description: An epic novel tracing the history of an African American family from slavery to present.

name: Harlem Shuffle
author: Colson Whitehead
description: A furniture salesman gets caught up in a heist in 1960s Harlem.

name: No One Is Talking About This
author: Patricia Lockwood
description: A woman famous on social media must confront real life when family tragedy strikes.

name: The Final Revival of Opal & Nev
author: Dawnie Walton
description: A fictional oral history of a 1970s rock duo and the incident that changed their lives.

name: When We Cease to Understand the World
author: Benjamín Labatut
description: Blending fact and fiction, stories of scientific discovery and madness.

name: The Prophets
author: Robert Jones, Jr.
description: A love story between two enslaved men on a Deep South plantation.

name: Detransition, Baby
author: Torrey Peters
description: Three women navigate gender, sexuality, and unconventional family structures.

name: Great Circle
author: Maggie Shipstead
description: The story of a female aviator who disappeared in 1950 and a modern actress playing her in a film.

name: The Committed
author: Viet Thanh Nguyen
description: A sequel to The Sympathizer, following a Vietnamese spy in 1980s Paris.

name: How Beautiful We Were
author: Imbolo Mbue
description: An African village fights against an American oil company destroying their land.

name: The Five Wounds
author: Kirstin Valdez Quade
description: A multigenerational story of a New Mexican family in crisis.

name: The Other Black Girl
author: Zakiya Dalila Harris
description: A young Black woman working in publishing notices strange happenings when another Black woman is hired.

name: The Maidens
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A group therapist becomes obsessed with proving a Greek tragedy professor is a murderer.

name: Razorblade Tears
author: S.A. Cosby
description: Two ex‑cons, one Black and one white, seek vengeance for their murdered gay sons.

name: The Plot
author: Jean Hanff Korelitz
description: A struggling writer steals a deceased student's brilliant plot idea, then someone threatens to expose him.

name: The Last House on Needless Street
author: Catriona Ward
description: A twisted psychological thriller about a man, his daughter, and his cat living in an eerie house.

name: The Night She Disappeared
author: Lisa Jewell
description: A young mother disappears after a night out, leaving behind only a note saying 'DIG HERE'.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
author: Alice Feeney
description: A couple's anniversary trip to Scotland turns deadly as secrets are revealed.

name: The Paper Palace
author: Miranda Cowley Heller
description: A woman must choose between her husband and her childhood love after a passionate encounter.
